definition: to push and pull/to move sth forward by shoving and pulling
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
variant of 挽[wan3]/to draw (a cart)/to lament the dead
to pull/to draw (a cart or a bow)/to roll up/to coil/to carry on the arm/to lament the dead/(fig.) to pull against/to recover

sentences.english: ZCS push pull forward converter using resonant elements is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了正激推挽电路的ZCS方案。

sentences.english: Push-Pull has a tension loop structure.
sentences.chinese: 推挽式是一种有张力拉伸的环状结构。

sentences.english: This holds true for both single-ended and push-pull designs.
sentences.chinese: 这也适用于这两个单端和推挽式设计。

definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
